name: What is Nightfall?
description: is a 1941 science fiction short story by the American writer Isaac Asimov about the coming of darkness to the people of a planet ordinarily illuminated by sunlight at all times. It was adapted into a novel with Robert Silverberg in 1990.

name: What happens in the book Nightfall?
description: Nightfall tells the story of an island where night and day don't happen every twenty-four hoursâ€”they alternate every fourteen years. Night is approaching and Marin and her family are preparing to leave their island for the Desert Lands, where they will spend the next fourteen years waiting for Day to return.

name: What happens in the end of Nightfall?
description: What is Nightfall? A nightfall, known scientifically as a nocturnal emission, and also informally known as a wet dream, sex dream, or sleep orgasm, is a spontaneous orgasm that involves ejaculation for males and vaginal wetness or an orgasm (or both) for females during sleep.
